project.project-descripcion: In this section you will be able to see my most outstanding projects.

project-1.descripcion: This is a project to enter data into a form, and with JavaScript we have validated that certain types of characters are accepted for each field, with a real-time validation.

project-2.descripcion: This project allows to perform CRUD operations with pure JavaScript, manipulating the DOM.

project-3.descripcion: This project allows you to search for soccer teams from different leagues or countries, in which the information of each club is displayed.

project-4.descripcion: This project allows to search for recipes, in which they are filtered by categories, and by means of a modal the description and the ingredients are shown, for them 3 apis were consumed.

project-5.descripcion: This project allows to quote a loan using a range that goes from 0 to 20000, in which it will be selected in how much time it will be paid, and the payment data will be shown in real time.
